title: Pilot
episode_desc: Midge Maisel has the perfect life. She is supportive of her husband's dream of becoming a stand up comic until he bombs on stage and blames her, leading Midge back to the comedy club and an act that might change her life.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

title: Ya Shivu v Bolshom Dome Na Kholme
episode_desc: Midge's life is in a tailspin in the wake of Joel leaving. Midge and Joel's parents butt heads while trying to keep their family together. Susie pushes Midge to get back on stage and find her voice.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

title: Because You Left
episode_desc: After another arrest, Midge finds herself in legal trouble, forcing her to rely on Susie's street smarts. Abe approaches Moishe with an interesting proposition. Lenny Bruce offers some unconventional inspiration for Midge's act.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

title: The Disappointment of the Dionne Quintuplets
episode_desc: Midge begins to move on from her once perfect life. Susie shows Midge the ropes while going on a tour of New York comedy clubs. Rose takes a bit too much pleasure in Midge's new living arrangements.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

title: Doink
episode_desc: Midge dives into a new line of work and makes some quirky friends along the way. Susie continues her emphatic quest to keep Midge's career moving forward, but gets hit with a couple setbacks. Both Midge and Joel experience the downsides of their new lifestyles.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

title: Mrs. X at the Gaslight
episode_desc: Midge finds a different kind of audience to perform for, much to Susie's chagrin. Abe gets offered the experience of a lifetime. The Weissmans come together for a family dinner. Susie finally shows off her management skills.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

title: Put That on Your Plate!
episode_desc: With Susie's help, Midge hones her act at the Gaslight. Abe surprises the women with a dinner guest, sending Rose into an emotional spiral. Working towards a promotion, Joel conjures up a new plan. Midge stirs up controversy after meeting a big-time comedian.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

title: Thank You and Good Night
episode_desc: Midge and Susie deal with the repercussions of Midge's off-script takedown of a famous comedian. With tensions still high at the Weissman household, Rose makes some bold changes. Midge and Joel reunite for Ethan's birthday party.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

title: Simone
episode_desc: In the Season Two premiere, Midge takes the stage for a foreign audience, while Abe and Rose find themselves in a new world. Susie experiences the repercussions of having a bad reputation in the business, as Joel regroups after quitting his job.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

title: Mid-way to Mid-town
episode_desc: Midge and Susie continue building Midge's standup career despite Midge's reluctance to tell her family and friends. Abe and Rose enjoy a new lifestyle. Joel offers some business advice to his parents and makes an effort to do right by Midge.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

title: The Punishment Room
episode_desc: Midge puts her impeccable planning to the test as she helps Mary with her special day. Joel attempts to keep finances steady at Maisel and Roth and ends up on a treasure hunt. Midge's act flourishes, but Susie's finances take a hit. Back at Columbia, Rose finds herself out of her comfort zone when auditing classes.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

title: We're Going to the Catskills!
episode_desc: Midge, Joel, Rose and Abe go to the summer vacation resort they go to every year for two months.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

title: Midnight at the Concord
episode_desc: Summer season at Steiner Mountain Resort continues as Moishe and Shirley join the group, disturbing Abe's peace. Susie tries to ward off a new friend while keeping a low profile at the resort. Midge jumps at the opportunity to redeem herself at B. Altman.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

title: Let's Face the Music and Dance
episode_desc: With Midge's secret now exposed to Abe, tensions between them are higher than ever. Summer is nearing an end with Susie fully immersed in her Steiner persona and Joel contemplating life as a bachelor. Rose takes advantage of Astrid's fragile state to learn some surprising intel about Noah.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

title: Look, She Made a Hat
episode_desc: Benjamin opens Midge's eyes to the New York art scene, and she ends up knowing more about art than she realizes. The Maisel and Weissman families come together for a tension-filled Yom Kippur dinner on the anniversary of Joel and Midge's separation. Meanwhile, a reluctant Susie turns to her family for help in advancing her career.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

title: Someday...
episode_desc: Midge and Susie gear up for their first roadtrip, and quickly learn that the dynamics of going on tour are more challenging than they thought. Back in New York, it's business as usual while Midge is away, forcing her to wonder if her new life is worth sacrificing her home life.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

title: Vote for Kennedy, Vote for Kennedy
episode_desc: Susie lands Midge her first gig on television, but their victory is short-lived when they realize Midge is being punished for her past. Abe is increasingly unhappy in his dream job at Bell Labs while Joel continues to drown in work during late nights at Maisel and Roth.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

title: All Alone
episode_desc: Midge and Rose begin planning for Midge's future as Benjamin attempts to impress Abe. Joel stresses over his next move, while Abe is presented with some big decisions of his own. Meanwhile, Susie tries to smooth things over for Midge.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

title: Strike Up the Band
episode_desc: Midge performs at a USO show ahead of touring with Shy while Susie learns the ins and outs of contract negotiation. Abe and Rose grapple with their new financial situation.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

title: It's the Sixties, Man!
episode_desc: Midge struggles with Susie taking on a new client. Joel meets a mystery girl, Mei, who is as frustrating as she is intriguing. Abe initiates a new project with a group of young beatniks. Midge and Joel deal with their divorce.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

title: Panty Pose
episode_desc: Rose and Abe move into less than desirable new digs. Midge struggles with her act as Shy's tour kicks off. Joel and Mei spark a connection.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

title: Hands!
episode_desc: Joel visits Midge in Vegas. Rose and Abe struggle as they adjust to their new life. Susie scores a big win for her new client.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

title: It's Comedy or Cabbage
episode_desc: Midge runs into an old friend in Miami. Abe grows frustrated with his beatnik friends while Rose reaches her breaking point with Shirley.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

title: Kind of Bleau
episode_desc: Abe and Rose find respite from Queens while visiting Midge. Joel and Mei squabble over a liquor license for the bar. Midge helps Shy out of a scrape.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

title: Marvelous Radio
episode_desc: Midge and Susie head back to NYC and hustle for work. Abe is elated when someone publishes a piece he wrote. The Maisels gather for the bris of Astrid's baby.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

title: A Jewish Girl Walks Into the Apollo...
episode_desc: Joel readies his club for its grand opening. Midge asks Moishe for a favor. Susie suffers a loss and turns to an unexpected source for help. Midge learns a hard show business lesson.
show_desc: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.
